observations.observation: 4 new receipts this window brought total to 3,559 and GMV to $206,407.44; 7-day GMV rose $631 to $33,541.88 and 7-day receipt count rose 6 to 609, indicating a healthy weekly intake rate.

1 new CBSA (33100) appeared this snapshot, bringing active metros to 24 per snapshot data. The trickle cadence between major bursts continues; the sequence now extends to 3→6→0→0→0→1→9→0→0→0→6→1→1→0→1→1→0→1→7→0→1, with the next major burst still pending.

Token velocity ticked up to 0.744x with acceleration at 1.006x — the sixteenth+ consecutive snapshot at or above 1.0x acceleration. Velocity is now 12.2% above the plateau floor (0.663x), continuing the longest unbroken acceleration streak in the dataset.

Best Buy entered the top brand list this snapshot — the first major physical retail chain to appear. At $206K GMV and 3,555 receipts, this signals the receipt layer is capturing brick-and-mortar spend alongside SaaS/digital.

7 new CBSAs appeared this snapshot (including non-metro areas in TN, PA, OR, ME, NV plus CBSAs 37980 and 33460), bringing active metros to 24 and representing 29.2% new geographic spread. The pulse amplitude continues escalating — this burst matches the prior 9-CBSA event in magnitude.

2 new receipts this window brought total to 3,553 and GMV to $205,776.16; one new wallet crossed into positive balance (133 total). Settlement velocity at 0 payouts/hr — quiet window consistent with inter-pulse cadence.

Zero new CBSAs this snapshot — active metro count holds at 25 (17 per quant metrics, discrepancy may reflect active vs. all-time). The trickle cadence between major bursts continues; the sequence now extends without a major pulse, suggesting the next burst is loading.

Token velocity ticked up to 0.737x with acceleration at 1.003x — the fifteenth+ consecutive snapshot at or above 1.0x acceleration. Velocity is now 11.2% above the plateau floor (0.663x), continuing the longest unbroken acceleration streak in the dataset.

1 new CBSA (37140) appeared this snapshot, bringing active metros to 25. The trickle cadence continues — sequence now reads 3→6→0→0→0→1→9→0→0→0→6→1→1→0→1→1→0→1, with the next major burst still pending and amplitude escalation suggesting it will exceed 9 new metros when it arrives.

Token velocity ticked up to 0.735x with acceleration at 1.009x — the fourteenth consecutive snapshot at or above 1.0x acceleration. Velocity is now 10.8% above the plateau floor (0.663x), and the streak length confirms the break is structural: no prior run has lasted this long without reverting below 1.0x.
